title: Some people...
body:
http://imgur.com/HPIejf2

Are fking hilarious, Ik it's an old post and you have probably seen it but it gives me room to address an important issue

This 
community
is
too
damn
negative

Most of the things on the NA boards are people complaining, the few popular posts on this board that are lucky enough to gain attention are usually people moaning on about one thing or another. People get shot down too quickly when trying to be constructive and there are not any trolls that bother people that much because people here are too negative anyway for it to be a massive diversion from the usual hate that gets slandered everywhere.

And lets be honest, when you saw this title you thought I was going to whinge about someone in a game or something didn't you? People are too self important, they don't seem to understand how important it is to have an open mind about what others think or do and believe that they are special and immediate action must be taken because they find it unpleasant.

I have a question, why?

replies.body:
this community is garbage, bunch of self entitled gimps who believe the slightest bit of constructive criticism is in some way abusing them, most have ZERO understanding of team comps, nor wish to learn.

but that might have something to do with the fact we have no punishment here, and no draft pick to learn our comps or strats. High elo players are forced to learn on smurfs which in turns creates more problems then it solves.


OCE when talked about in other regions is the laughing stock of the LOL Community, we are the trash, the scum and the putrid filth. and for those wishing change are given nothing but false hope from a team of staff who have ZERO control and say

if your creative or have any desire to be creative or develop the community in some way you are stomped on. NO ROOM FOR DEVELOPMENT OR ENCOURAGEMENT!

OCE is fuked.
So much truth, and it is really just sad.

You're Garbage. No one wants to hear what you have to say, stop abusing me. 

You'e just mad cos I smashed you on my smurf

You don't talk about OCE in other communities.

*fucked ......

what are you on about?

are you referring to the poster?

i'm slightly confused.
When will you do an AMA. The people need to know.

Big issue I see is this:

* Someone comes up with an idea for a change to a Champion/Item.
* Someone sees said idea and shit talks it immediately because it conflicts with either what they want, or what they're used to.
* Rioters end up being deterred by all the conflict and answer pointless/redundant threads instead.

As much as Riot tends to ignore the community, the community gives them a legitimate reason to do so.
